thread.section_title: Dragonimage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dragonimage | dragonimage.com.au
thread.title: Vick

author: Vick
title: Vick
text: I'm very impressed with your prices and your range however I didn't recieve a confirmation email or any kind of tracking info. I emailed to find out what happened and recieved no resonse, since it was a $1000 purchase that made me very nervous. I was worried that I'd typed my email wrong but since I've just received this email asking me about my experience I'm guessing that's not the case.
